member.name: T:PySharp.PySharp
member.summary: This class deals with communication between C# and Python

member.name: M:PySharp.PySharp.ExecutePy(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method executes a Python script and returns the printed values, in case of failure, it writes errors to a file, refer to line 38
member.param: Filepath to the Python interpreter, aka python.exe
Filepath to the script that you want to launch, including arguments (optional) to pass. Example: @"..\script.py 2 5", with 2 and 5 being the passed arguments.
Set to false if you want the script's console to show up
